name: Wednesday Responsive Grid System
description:
This file is designed to help you get started with the basics of a responsive grid. Are you ready to get your grid on?


Here's what's included:


  • Steps to add grids to your design library
  • Grid Anatomy
  • Configuring Breakpoints
  • Fixed vs Fluid grid
  • Steps to create a Hybrid grid
  • 3 Fluid grids for mobile, tablet, and desktop
  • 1 Fixed grid for large desktop
  • Grids of products and websites like - Spotify, Notion, Netflix, Muzli, and Tuesday.is
